response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds significant value for us at $1,200,000. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be a valuable asset to you, estimated at $800,000 by your standards. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to acquire a product that could potentially exceed your expectations. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
